title: Innapropriate Club Names and Summoner Names
body:
How is there no filter on some club and summoner names?  

I.E. Club - ISIS Jihadi

I just feel like club names like that should not be allowed.

replies.body:
Because Isis has multiple meanings, and has had a meaning far before the group name.....

example being a goddess....
The addition of the word Jihadi kind of narrows down the users intentions here.

Possibly, but riot isn't allowed to make assumptions like that.

The fact that there's chances of multiple meanings is the reason why they can't just ban them instantly.

You can't filter every possible combination of letters that people use to describe bad things, especially when banning something like "isis" prevents you from using the word "crisis" at all.

If you see a club name or summoner name you feel is inappropriate, use the post-game report feature and choose the name option, then add a note with the club/summoner name to make sure they know what they're reviewing.
Filters frequently cause problems with legitimate words/phrases, please report them after the match.
